testsuite.name: gulp-mode test suite with custom options

testcase.classname: gulp-mode test suite with custom options

testcase.name: default options, NODE_ENV=prod, CLI argument=--prod -> prod() == child, dev() == noop, demo() == noop

testcase.name: default options, NODE_ENV=prod, CLI argument=--dev -> prod() == child, dev() == child, demo() == noop

testcase.name: default options, NODE_ENV=dev, CLI argument=--prod -> prod() == child, dev() == child, demo() == noop
